name: iSelect
0:
”Alexa, set weight to ten pounds”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
iSelect smart dumbbells help you create an interactive strength training experience in the comfort of your home. Dumbbells adjust from 5-50 lbs. in 5 lb. increments with Alexa voice controls (device not included). Motorized weight selector responds to vocal prompts for hands-free adjustments. 

How to use iSelect:

Ask your Alexa to open the iSelect app and modify the weight of your dumbbells to your desired amount. Dumbbells can increase or decrease in increments of 5 or more pounds and have a maximum weight of 50 pounds.

You can say:
Alexa, set weight to fifteen pounds
Alexa, set weight of weights to ten pounds
Alexa, set weight of weights to curls
Alexa, set weight to squat
Alexa, increase weight by five pounds
Alexa, decrease weight by ten pounds

How to connect your iFit account to Alexa:

Once you enable the iSelect skill, you will be prompted to sign in to your iFit account to connect it to Alexa. If you don’t have an account, you can create one through the iFit app or visit the website iFit.com.

Feedback and support:

If there’s anything we can do to improve your iSelect experience, or you have questions or comments, let us know at Support@iFit.com. Your feedback is important to us!
